_sText:
Clanmates asked me to make a map that sort of simulated what toggle wallhax might be like.  Here's what I came up with.

Seems perfect for "stealth" knifing, since its easy to get behind people.
Though stealth isn't really the right word for it.

Its really hard to show what the map looks like through pictures, and I can't do a video..  So basically, they fade in and out, though not totally clear.
